definitions.body: thin, of kine [[בָּשָׂר]] ´[[דּ]] Ge 41:3 cf. v:Ge 41:4 (Sam has in both [[רַקּוֹת]] cf. MT v:Ge 41:19, v:Ge 41:20, v:Ge 41:27); of ears of corn v:Ge 41:6, v:Ge 41:7, v:Ge 41:23, v:Ge 41:24 (all E); thin, shrunk, withered, of man Le 21:20 (H).

small, fine, of the manna [[דַּק מְחֻסְפָּס דַּק כַּכְּפׂר]] Ex 16:14; of incense Le 16:12, hair Le 13:30 (all P); of dust [[אָבָק]] [[דַּק]] Is 29:5; in sim. of isles in hand of ´[[י]], [[אִיִּים כַּדַּק]] [[יִטּוֹל]] Is 40:15 ([[דַּק]] = subst. fine thing, fine dust); once of a low whisper [[קוֹל דְּמָמָה דַקָּה]] 1Ki 19:12.
